title: Vincent Kompany succeeds Thomas Tuchel as Bayern Munich head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Bayern Munich have named Vincent Kompany as their replacement for Thomas Tuchel in the head coaching role.

title: FC Bayern extend contracts of coaching team
snippet: Assistant coaches René Marić, Aaron Danks and Floribert Ngalula along with goalkeeping coach Michael Rechner have extended their contracts with FC Bayern ► Read now!

title: Bayern Munich appoint Vincent Kompany as coach
snippet: Belgian Vincent Kompany, 38, has been named Bayern Munich coach.

title: Bayern Munich - Staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: Trainer, Manager und Co.: Diese Statistik listet alle Mitarbeiter, gegliedert nach ihrer Funktion, von dem Verein Bayern Munich auf, die aktuell für den Verein arbeiten.

title: Vincent Kompany named Bayern Munich head coach - The Athletic
snippet: It was announced in February that Bayern head coach Thomas Tuchel would step down at the end of the season having been appointed in March last year on a contract through to 2025.
